bill.summary:
Appalachian Forest National Heritage Area Act of 2015
Establishes the Appalachian Forest National Heritage Area to include specified counties in the states of Maryland and West Virginia.
Designates the Appalachian Forest Heritage Area, Inc., as the local coordinating entity for the Area.
Requires the Appalachian Forest Heritage Area, Inc., to submit a management plan that provides for the conservation, enhancement, and interpretation of cultural, natural, historical, educational, scenic, and recreational resources of the Area.
